test_description: Verify offline job resolution queues locally and syncs successfully upon network restoration
business_risk: Critical - Data loss or job state inconsistency leads to SLA breaches
preconditions: Technician logged in; 'Work In Progress' job downloaded; Device in Airplane Mode
test_steps: 1. Open active job; 2. Enter notes and capture signature; 3. Tap 'Resolve'; 4. Verify local 'Pending Sync' state; 5. Disable Airplane Mode; 6. Verify background sync execution
expected_result: Job status updates locally immediately; Syncs to backend upon reconnect; Customer receives notification; Local queue clears
test_data_needs: Test Technician Account; Assigned Service Request; Mock Signature Data
tools_required: Detox (Mobile); WireMock (Backend Stub); Network Link Conditioner
dependencies: WatermelonDB Sync Engine; Service Request API; Notification Service
success_criteria: Zero data loss; Sync completes < 5s after reconnect; Idempotency maintained on retry
failure_impact: High - Technician work lost; Customer billing/status inaccurate
cleanup_requirements: Reset job status; Clear local DB
security_considerations: Local data encryption at rest; Secure sync transport
accessibility_requirements: Offline indicator visible to screen reader

test_description: Verify automated routing logic assigns correct Service Center based on User location polygon
business_risk: High - Service requests assigned to wrong center causes delays and contract violations
preconditions: Service Centers defined with non-overlapping PostGIS polygons; User addresses geocoded
test_steps: 1. Create Service Request with lat/long inside SC-A polygon; 2. Create Service Request with lat/long inside SC-B polygon; 3. Create Service Request outside all polygons
expected_result: Request 1 -> SC-A; Request 2 -> SC-B; Request 3 -> 'No Coverage' error/fallback
test_data_needs: GeoJSON Polygons for Service Areas; Test User Addresses (Geocoded)
cleanup_requirements: Truncate service requests; Reset Service Center coverage

test_description: Verify end-to-end latency of technician location updates to customer map
business_risk: Medium - Poor UX if laggy; Customer trust erosion
preconditions: Technician 'Travel Mode' active; Customer WebSocket connected
test_steps: 1. Simulate GPS stream from Tech client (1Hz); 2. Measure timestamp at ingestion; 3. Measure timestamp at Customer client receipt; 4. Calculate delta
expected_result: Location updates reflect on customer map with < 2000ms latency p95
test_data_needs: GPX trace file for simulation; JWTs for Auth
dependencies: SignalR Service; Redis Backplane; Mobile Clients
security_considerations: Validate WSS encryption; Token validation on socket connect
